item.title: Microsoft Defender Experts Disrupt Jasper Sleet’s Insider Access Campaign
item.description: Threat actors are increasingly infiltrating organizations by securing legitimate jobs, often through falsified credentials or insider recruitment. Recently, Microsoft Defender Experts, powered by Microsoft Threat Intelligence, successfully thwarted a sophisticated campaign by Jasper Sleet (formerly Storm-0287), a North Korean state-sponsored threat actor known for stealthy infiltration tactics. Rather than compromising victims directly, these actors pose as job applicants or contractors, infiltrating organizations to gain long-term insider access under false identities.
